pages.text: With a bee jar you can show a bee of your choice to the world without the risk that it'll fly away. You can use a hopper or some other item pipe to insert a $(l:items/bee_cage)bee cage$(/l) containing a bee of your choosing. You can safely break the jar if you want to store it or move it around, the bee will stay inside.
Note that not only will you loose your bee cage, but you also won't be able to get the bee back once it's inside - so choose wisely!
